Name: District service cabinet.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the district service cabinet.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Governmental Operations
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

RTF:
{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}
\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\ul Be it enacted by the Council as follows:\par
\ulnone\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\sa200\sl480\slmult1\qj\tab Section 1. Subdivision a of section 2705 of the New York city charter is amended to read as follows:\par
\tab\'a7 2705. District service cabinet. a. There shall be a district service cabinet within each community district established pursuant to this chapter. The members of the district service cabinet shall include:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\sa200\sl480\slmult1\qj (1) The agency officials designated pursuant to paragraph one of subdivision f of section twenty-seven hundred four;\par
(2) Representatives of other agencies that provide local services on a regular basis in the community district, who shall be the ranking line official assigned to the district\ul , a representative of the department of design and construction, and a representative of the office of environmental remediation\ulnone ;\par
(3) Each council member whose district comprises all or part of the community district;\par
(4) A representative of the department of city planning designated by the director of city planning;\par
(5) The district manager appointed pursuant to subdivision f of section twenty-eight hundred; and,\par
(6) The chairperson of the community board for the community district or his or her representative.\par
\'a72. This local law shall take effect ninety days from its enactment.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\sa200\sl276\slmult1\qj\par
